name: Diário 3 - Não estou mais aqui (4/5)
description:
Fragment number 4 of "Diário 3 - Não estou mais aqui".

The fourth of 5 images that when put together, side by side, form a big panel. Think of the whole piece as an album, and each fragment as a song ;)

In this visual diary we visit places in Curitiba that are not the same nowadays. Of course, everything changes... But for example, fragments 4 and 5 show what used to be an abandoned space of what used to be an old house downtown, near a shopping mall called "Estação". Now the whole thing is demolished, it will only exist in these records and I knew this when I took the photos in 2017.
